name: Dive in Dark
description:
Dive in dark is an isometric horror/adventure game where yo walk in a dark forest finding lost memories.

This game was made for the GGJ2021.

Controls

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

TAB - Check map and photo progress

Space - Take objects

L-Mouse - Rotate objects
